metadata.title: CVE-2018-20340 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Yubico libu2f-host 1.1.6 contains unchecked buffers in devs.c, which couldenable a malicious token to exploit a buffer overflow. An attacker coulduse this to attempt to execute malicious code using a crafted USB devicemasquerading as a security token on a computer where the affected libraryis currently in use. It is not possible to perform this attack with agenuine YubiKey.

criterions.comment: libu2f-host package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
